page.title: 15FUTURE PLANS
page.content: {By Pass It was originally envisaged that the West Calder by-pass would commence at the A71/A704 junction.It would pass well to the south of West Calder.A study by Lothian Regional Council proposed four options.The most effective option was that the by-pass be effectively phased in.Each phase being able to operate independantly until the other phases were completed. So far this has not been put into operation. {Daks-Simpson The factory expanded for the first time in 20 years due to an increase in orders from Marks and Spencer who are their sole customer.The new factory has a production area of 36000 square feet and is rented from The Scottish Development Agency(S.D.A).The total cost is still not known.
